DOC.criteria: AJCC pathological stage IIV cancer head neck meet follow criterion : If gross total resection perform must complete within 7 week registration Site tumor origin nasopharynx , oral cavity , oropharynx , parotid , larynx , hypopharynx ( exclude lip , sinus ) Pretreatment evaluation require eligibility include : History physical examination within four week prior study entry Dental evaluation management accord guideline Appendix IV prior start radiation Serum pregnancy test , applicable , within one week prior study entry ; urine dipstick test first day treatment Radiographic Studies : Preoperative CT MRI primary tumor neck clinical staging required Patients must â‰¥ 18 year age . Women childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) must willing consent use effective contraception treatment . Pregnant woman ineligible radiation therapy involve unforeseeable risk embryo fetus . WOCBP must negative serum urine pregnancy test ( minimum sensitivity 25 IU/L equivalent unit human chorionic gonadotropin [ hCG ] , accordance local regulation , whichever sensitive ) . Patients must sign studyspecific inform consent form prior registration . Histology positive melanoma . Gross ( visible palpable ) disease leave surgery . Less gross total resection patient require stag surgery . Prior head neck radiotherapy .
